                                                                Appendix I
                                       MD 85 Project Planning Study Information




                                                             December 2010                                      Page I of P
MDSHA: PLC - FR388_21 - MD 0085 BUCKEYSTOWN PIKE SOUTH OF ENGLISH ... Page 1 of 1



                                                                                                               Problem Solver | Maryland.gov | Online Services | State Agencies | Phone Directory


                                                                                                                                                             Search




                          Projects Home                                                                          Projects Advanced Search

                          PROJECT INFORMATION

                             Project       Schedule     Documents       Contacts        Map(s)         Media          Feedback      FAQ


                          County:          Frederick                               Project Number:                    FR388_21
                           MD 0085 BUCKEYSTOWN PIKE SOUTH OF ENGLISH MUFFIN WAY TO NORTH OF GROVE ROAD
    BUSINESS CENTER
                                                                                                                When will this impact me?
                          Project Name:
  PROJECTS & STUDIES
                          MD 85, Buckeystown Pike

  COMMUTER & TRAVEL
                          Location of Project:

                          SOUTH OF ENGLISH MUFFIN WAY TO NORTH OF GROVE ROAD
   SAFETY PROGRAMS

                          Description:
ENVIRONMENT & COMMUNITY
                          Upgrade MD 85 to a multi-lane divided highway from south of English Muffin Way to north of Grove Road (2.40
                          miles). Wide curb lanes will accommodate bicycles.
      INFO CENTER
                          Scope:
                          The MD 85 Phase 1 interchange project is the first of three projects included in the "MD 85 Planning Study".
      CONTACT US
                          The project includes a new interchange at MD 85 and I-270, along with roadway improvements to MD 85
                          between Spectrum Drive and Crestwood Boulevard. Phase 2 of the Planning Study extends southward from
                          Crestwood Boulevard to English Muffin Way, and includes the replacement of the bridge over Ballenger Creek.
                          Phase 3 extends from Spectrum Drive northward to tie-in with the recently-completed improvements near the
                          MD 85/MD 355 intersection.

                          What is under study:
                          Phase 1 of the project includes upgrading the MD 85 interchange at I-270 and the tie-ins required at Spectrum
                          Drive and Crestwood Boulevard. The interchange design will need to be compatible with long-term
                          improvements proposed as part of the I-270/US 15 Multi-modal Study. The two I-270 bridges over MD 85 will be
                          removed and replaced with a longer, wider structure that can accommodate the additional lanes required on
                          MD 85 to accommodate the design year traffic (2030). Northbound MD 85 will expand from the existing two-
                          lane section under the bridge to five lanes: A double-left that exits to I-270 North, two through lanes, and an
                          acceleration/deceleration lane for the loop ramps. Southbound MD 85 will expand to four lanes: A double-left
                          that exits to I-270 South and two through lanes. Additional space will be included for future expansion of MD 85.

                          Associated Improvement Projects:
                          www.marylandroads.com

                          Associated Projects not managed by SHA:


                          Project Type:

                          INTERCHANGE RECONSTRUCT


                          Current Phase:                    Design

                          Funded Year :                     2003                   How much will this project cost?
                          Funding Source(s):                State/Federal
                          Last Updated On : 3/31/2010

                  MD 85 at English Muffin Way - Eastbound Left Turn Improvement - Preliminary Cost Estimate

                               Description                                Unit     Quantity    Unit Cost      Total Cost

     THERMOPLASTIC PAVEMENT MARKING LINES
     REMOVAL OF EXISTING PERMANENT PAVEMENT LINE MARKINGS
                                                                           LF        300         $0.75         $225.00
     ANY WIDTH
     F & I WHITE PREFORMED THERMOPLASTIC PAVEMENT MARKING
                                                                           SF        102        $25.00        $2,550.00
     LEGENDS AND SYMBOLS
     REMOVE & DISPOSE MATERIAL AND EQUIPMENT PER ASSIGNMENT                EA         1        $1,500.00      $1,500.00
     F & I 12" LED VEHICULAR TRAFFIC SIGNAL HEAD SECTION                   EA         22        $350.00       $7,700.00
     SHEET ALUMINUM SIGNS                                                  SF         25         $25.00        $625.00
     REAIM VIDEO DETECTION CAMERA                                          EA          1        $100.00        $100.00
     F & I ELECTRICAL CABLE - 5 CONDUCTOR (NO. 14 AWG)                     LF         30          $2.25         $67.50
